blog.name: billybatson-rates-dogs
blog.title: S H A Z A M !

question: Are you still homeless?
answer: Kinda sorta………. It’s fine though! I sleep in the boiler room in a old apartment building. It’s nice and warm in there, and I have a bunch of blankets that people left behind in a laundromat that are really comfy to sleep in! Plus there’s a lock on the door and everything so no one’ll steal my stuff! :D

summary:
X-men and Avenger will never 
co-exist.
Spider-man the X-men mythos are better off segregated to there own universes. No marvel...
body:
Facts of the day

X-men and Avenger will never

co-exist.

Spider-man the X-men mythos are better off segregated to there own universes. No marvel universe in either universes.

Captain Marvel and Rogue should always hate each other.

Spider-man was better off under Sony’s care pre MCU.

Every hero should hate Deadpool.

Captain America and Wolverine should always despise each other.

Non-lethal hero’s and anti heroes should always hate each other.

summary: Captain Marvel è pronta a scatenare una rivoluzione nel nuovo poster promozionale
title: Captain Marvel è pronta a scatenare una rivoluzione nel nuovo poster promozionale
body:
Captain Marvel è pronta a scatenare una rivoluzione nel nuovo poster promozionale

Captain Marvel arriverà presto nei cinema e una nuova immagine promozionale è emersa online in previsione dell’uscita del film.

Mancano solo pochi mesi all’arrivo alla pellicola solista della prima super-eroina della Marvel sul grande schermo. Col passare del tempo fino all’uscita di Captain Marvel, sempre più notizie sull’eroina continuano a emergere (qui le trovate tutte), generando clamore…

title: Let’s talk about Captain Marvel
body:
I went to see the trailers on YouTube and the amount of sexist and hateful comments under them are kinda disgusting. Here are some gems for you:

AKA, she looks like a grown woman, who could probably bench press this fucking idiot, and thus isn’t going to look like a stereotypical model-like character. She looks damn fine to me. 

In this comment I assume they mean that her being a space soldier who got her memories jumbled and yet can still fight and be witty isn’t exactly in line with her gender, and thus, I imagine, isn’t appealing to this person. How unfortunate for them, I can only assume they’re single.  

I deduce that this guy got kicked out of the apartment by his now ex-girlfriend and has decided that the word ‘feminist’ is an insult and therefore should be capitalized. He stumbled onto this trailer and from what I can see, is raging against anybody who is disagreeing with what he said. He is very insecure.

This dude is sexist and trying to hide it by using comics as an excuse. The ‘Captain Marvel’ mantle was passed onto Carol Danvers so long ago that a lot of people aren’t even aware that it was ever anyone else. There are several other comments like this, all of them equally as ridiculous. 

How insightful, but as a bisexual girl I’ll just go ahead and comment that Carol Danvers + helmet mohawk is the hottest Big Dick Energy. 

Look at this MAJESTY

I can’t wait for her to wreck that ugly grape. 

Stop disrespecting my fucking badass space wife.

summary: Captain Marvel: Important Things To Know Before Watching The Movie
title: Captain Marvel: Important Things To Know Before Watching The Movie
body:
Captain Marvel: Important Things To Know Before Watching The Movie

Marvel is set to release its first female superhero movie, Captain Marvel on March 8.

Captain Marvel is played by Brie Larson and it will feature two new alien races: Kree and Skrulls, the founding of SHIELD, and more. According to the official plot released by Marvel, Captain Marvel gets caught in the middle of a galactic war between the two alien races.

There are many unknown things about…

View On WordPress

title: Captain Marvel #1
body:
Critique de Captain Marvel #1 - un nouveau départ pour notre héroïne et une équipe créative de haut-niveau.

Afin d’accompagner dignement le film à venir, Marvel Comics offre à Captain Marvel un nouveau titre solo mené par une équipe créative plutôt prometteuse : la scénariste superstar Kelly Thompson et la dessinatrice Carmen Carnero. (more…)

View On WordPress
